item.title: Last Cup of Sorrow
item.description: [[songs/t/tool/ænima/ænema.md#i-wanna-see-it-come-down-vyl-wnanory|This is getting old and so are you]] [[songs/t/tool/ænima/ænema.md#i-wanna-see-it-come-down-vyl-wnanory|Everything you know and never knew]] [[songs/t/tool/ænima/ænema.md#i-wanna-see-it-come-down-vyl-wnanory|Will run through your fingers just like sand]] [[songs/t/tool/ænima/ænema.

item.title: Naked in Front of the Computer
item.description: [[songs/w/we_came_as_romans/we_came_as_romans/tear_it_down.md#ill-tear-it-down-kingdom-built-on-lies-vyl-wnanory|My box is full]] [[songs/w/we_came_as_romans/we_came_as_romans/tear_it_down.md#ill-tear-it-down-kingdom-built-on-lies-vyl-wnanory|And my mouth is full]] [[songs/w/we_came_as_romans/we_came_as_romans/tear_it_down.md#ill-tear-it-down-kingdom-built-on-lies-vyl-wnanory|And my life is full]] [[songs/w/we_came_as_romans/we_came_as_romans/tear_it_down.md#ill-tear-it-down-kingdom-built-on-lies-vyl-wnanory|Until the memory’s full]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/swing.
